articles.author: Shereen Bhan
articles.title: India is a promising destination for global investors, says EY CEO Carmine Di Sibio - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Ernst & Young (EY) CEO Carmine De Sibio says India is on top of the list for global investors. Speaking to CNBC-TV18, he said there is huge appetite to invest in India and identified geopolitics as the biggest risk to global growth.
